vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) serpent, fiery serpent
1a) poisonous serpent (fiery from burning effect of poison)
§ 1) serpent, fiery serpent
1a) poisonous serpent (fiery from burning effect of poison)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (1)   tipo de serpiente ; (2)   serafín; (3)   hombre; tribu de Judá

2) 撒拉弗

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ This name is used for:
1) seraph, seraphim
1a) majestic beings with 6 wings, human hands or voices in attendance upon God
